Maserati 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Maserati vehicles. Curious to know what Maserati model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Maserati 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Maserati models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Maserati model changed across years or compare between different models of the Maserati family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Maserati 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Maserati cars

Maserati GranTurismo 0-60 4.55 - 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 12.75 @ 107 - 13.8 @ 103 mph
Maserati Spyder 0-60 4.6 - 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 12.9 @ 103 - 13.7 @ 103 mph
Maserati Quattroporte 0-60 4.6 - 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 13 @ 108 - 14.3 @ 98 mph
Maserati Ghibli 0-60 4.7 - 5.5 sec 1/4 mile 13.2 @ 104 - 13.8 @ 98 mph
Maserati Levante 0-60 5 - 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 13.8 @ 0 - 15 @ 0 mph
Maserati GranSport 0-60 5 - 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 13.5 @ 105 - 13.6 @ 104 mph
Maserati Coupe 0-60 5 - 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 12.8 @ 104 - 13.7 @ 104 mph
